title: Luminary Opening Night: Igshaan Adams—Desire Lines
short_description: Gather at the museum with fellow Luminary members to celebrate the opening of Igshaan Adams: Desire Lines.
list_description: Gather at the Art Institute with fellow Luminary members to celebrate the opening of Igshaan Adams: Desire Lines.
description:
Celebrate the opening of Igshaan Adams: Desire Lines and experience Adams's monumental weavings, which highlight the material aspects of lived spaces and the personal stories they hold. Hendrik Folkerts, now curator of international contemporary art at the Moderna Museet in Stockholm, returns to join the artist in conversation and discuss how Adams weaves together textiles, sculpture, and performance to transform everyday materials into intricate reflections on hybrid identity and spirituality.

So that you can enjoy your experience safely, all guests must provide proof of vaccination or a negative covid test to attend this event, and masks are required.

Valet parking and coat check will be available.

Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
